titleStmt.title: Milke for babes. Or, a north-countrie catechisme. Made plaine and easy, to the capacitie of the countrie people. / By William Crashavv, Batchellor in Diuinity and preacher of the Word...
titleStmt.author: Crashaw, William, 1572-1626.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Nicholas Okes, and are to be sold by Thomas Langley, at his shop ouer against the Sarazens head without Newgate.,

notesStmt.note: Printer's device (McK. 251) on t.p.; head-pieces, initials.
Imperfect: stained, torn, worn, and cropped, with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: British Library.

place.placeName: his shop ouer against the Sarazens head without Newgate.
